name: Stickman: Zombie Defense
description:
Point and Click to Shoot
When you have no ammo Press R to Reload
Don't Die!

Mobile Update: Tap the mobile icon to switch to mobile mode and if youŕe out of ammo press the "R" Button to reload tap shop to open, buy, and exit.

Shop Update: If you have 10 $ and less than max <3 then click the shop and buy the health pack
The Zombies don't care though so they will come for you so be quick!
